Methods

validate()

validate() : bool

Validates that the value is only letters (upper/lower case) and digits.

Returns

bool —

True if valid, false if not.

Tags

None found

sanitize()

sanitize() : bool

Strips non-alphanumeric characters from the value.

Returns

bool —

Always true.

isBlank()

isBlank() : bool

Is the value blank?

Blank is null, empty string, or a string of only whitespace. Non-null non-string values are not blank; e.g., integer zero, float zero, an empty array, boolean false, etc. are not blank.

Returns

bool —

True if blank, false if not.

Inherited from
\Aura\Filter\AbstractRule
